remarks: Value of the binomial coefficient, ` N ` choose ` K ` .  Definition of binomial coefficient in [Gleason] p. 295.  As suggested by Gleason, we define it to be 0 when ` 0 <_ K <_ N ` does not hold.  See ~ bcval2 for the value in the standard domain.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jul-2005.)
